xml:
Nimenrix<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Immunisation against Neisseria meningitidis

By intramuscular injection

  • Child 1–17 years

    0.5 mL for 1 dose, to be injected preferably into deltoid region (or anterolateral thigh in child 1–2 years), then 0.5 mL after 1 year if required for 1 dose, second dose should be considered in those who continue to be at risk of Neisseria meningitidis serogroup A infection.

  • Adult

    0.5 mL for 1 dose, to be injected preferably into deltoid region, then 0.5 mL after 1 year if required for 1 dose, second dose should be considered in those who continue to be at risk of Neisseria meningitidis serogroup A infection.

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
